- Wash hands with soap before starting work.
- Wash hands after using a phone or tablet.
- Wash hands after touching waste or dirty equipment.
- Cover any cut with a waterproof dressing.

## ğŸ‘• CLOTHING

- Wear a clean apron.
- Wear a clean hat.
- Wear clean shoes in the kitchen.

## ğŸ² FOOD & UTENSILS

- Use clean utensils and equipment.
- Use different utensils for each dietary pot.
- Clean spills immediately.

## â›” DO NOT

- Do not eat or drink in the kitchen or portioning area.
- Do not work when sick.
- Do not use the same utensils for different dietary pots.
- Do not handle food after using a phone without washing hands.
- Do not ignore hygiene issues.

These rules complement all other Community Kitchen procedures. They do not replace or supersede them.
